title: Smartwatch global unit sales forecast 2014 to 2015
summary: Overall Asia Pacific, and North America are rapidly increasing, Western Europe, Central and Eastern Europe, China, South America, and Middle East and Africa are gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
South America reported the lowest SOME LABEL about 0.1 in Year 2014
Asia Pacific, and North America has increased by 6.7, and 6.2 times respectively.
